nodes.text: A male Rebel officer was part of the personnel at Ghost Base, a Rebel installation on the planet of Krant, between 0.5 ABY and 2 ABY. At one point during his time at the base, he was scouting and discovered that the Galactic Empire's Strike force Alpha was preparing to attack Ghost Base. The officer tried to delay the strike force but was wounded in the attempt. Strike Force Alpha took control of Ghost Base and established its own military camp among the base's remains. The officer was later discovered by a Rebel team led by the emissary Leia Organa, and he recounted his story to the team.

The officer was mentioned in the Reconnaissance briefing before the second Princess Leia campaign mission in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds. The campaign was also included in the game's 2002 expansion pack, Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds: Clone Campaigns.
